mapper.sql: ID, TEST_SET_CASE_ID, EXECUTE_ROUND, CASE_EXECUTE_RESULT, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT turnCase.id,setcase.id as setCaseID,testset.id as testSetId,setcase.SYSTEM_ID,testset.TEST_SET_NUMBER, testset.EXECUTE_ROUND,setcase.CASE_TYPE,turnCase.CASE_EXECUTE_RESULT, turnCase.EXECUTE_ROUND,setcase.CASE_NAME,setcase.CASE_NUMBER,task.TEST_TASK_CODE,setcase.CASE_PRECONDITION from tbl_test_set_execute_round_case_result turnCase LEFT JOIN tbl_test_set_case setcase on turnCase.TEST_SET_CASE_ID=setcase.ID LEFT JOIN tbl_test_set testset on setcase.TEST_SET_ID =testset.ID LEFT JOIN tbl_test_task task on testset.TEST_TASK_ID=task.id LEFT JOIN tbl_test_set_execute_round_user setUser on setUser.TEST_SET_ID=testset.id LEFT JOIN tbl_user_info userinfo on userinfo.id=setUser.EXECUTE_USER_ID
setUser.EXECUTE_USER_ID=#{id} and turnCase.STATUS=1
AND setcase.CASE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{caseName},'%')
AND task.TEST_TASK_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{taskCode},'%')
AND testset.TEST_SET_NUMBER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{testSetNumber},'%')
AND turnCase.EXECUTE_ROUND =#{excuteRound}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_test_set_execute_round_case_result ( TEST_SET_CASE_ID, EXECUTE_ROUND, CASE_EXECUTE_RESULT, CREATE_BY, EXECUTE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{testSetCase.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{testSetCase.excuteRound,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{testSetCase.caseExecuteResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testSetCase.lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{testSetCase.lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

insert into tbl_test_set_execute_round_case_result (TEST_SET_CASE_ID,EXECUTE_ROUND,CASE_EXECUTE_RESULT, CREATE_BY,EXECUTE_USER_ID,CREATE_DATE,LAST_UPDATE_DATE) values ( #{tblCaseStep.setCaseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tblCaseStep.excuteRound,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 2, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
